All-Day Flat Rates and Per Minute Billing.

All rate indicated is in Singapore Dollar regardless where are you calling from.

Please note that from 1st January 2023, adjustment has been made on the IDD calling rates.

Nautilus Rates are subject to change without any prior notice.

Nautilus only can guarantee local caller identification for call made from Singapore. We cannot guarantee that your local caller identification will reflect on the receivers overseas.

Terms and Conditions

Nautilus’ All-day flat rates and per-minute billing are in Singapore Dollar (SGD) regardless of location, and are subject to change without prior notice.

Caller ID is only guaranteed for local calls made in Singapore. Overseas calls may or may not show the caller ID on the receiver’s end.

Note: Changes to the IDD calling rates have been put into effect starting from January 1, 2023.

Whether you’re an SME or an Enterprise, we have the right solution for you.
